guides.name: Abebe Kassa
guides.description: Abebe is a knowledgeable guide with many years of experience leading tours of historical sites and cultural experiences throughout Ethiopia.

guides.name: Makeda Tadesse
guides.description: Makeda is a passionate guide who specializes in leading tours of Ethiopia's beautiful natural landscapes, including hiking, camping, and wildlife watching.

guides.name: Yohannes Girma
guides.description: Yohannes is a friendly and knowledgeable guide who can take you on a culinary tour of Ethiopia's diverse and delicious cuisine.

guides.name: Selamawit Haile
guides.description: Selamawit is a dynamic and fun-loving guide who can show you the best of Ethiopia's cities, including sightseeing, shopping, and nightlife.

guides.name: Zerihun Asfaw
guides.description: Zerihun is a knowledgeable guide who specializes in leading tours of Ethiopia's rich religious and cultural heritage, including visits to ancient churches and participation in traditional festivals.

guides.name: Abebech Travel Guide
guides.description: Experienced guide with vast knowledge of the city's history and landmarks.

guides.name: Yohannes Travel Guide
guides.description: Passionate guide who loves to explore the outdoors and share knowledge about local flora and fauna.

guides.name: Biruk Tour Guide
guides.description: Friendly and enthusiastic guide who loves to showcase the local cuisine and cultural traditions.

guides.name: Meron Travel Guide
guides.description: Adrenaline junkie guide who specializes in activities such as bungee jumping, white-water rafting, and more.

guides.name: Asrat Tour Guide
guides.description: Passionate guide with in-depth knowledge of local wildlife and conservation efforts.
